duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with third-party consultants for the global SAP S/4 HANA implementation and drive continuous improvement in supply chain management.
Provide production support, new functional enhancements, and global project implementations in collaboration with the business organization.
Expertise in end-to-end logistics processes related to Material Management and Production Planning.
Design and develop user training documentation, test plans, and test script development for SAP implementation.
Communicate with stakeholders and provide ongoing support in SAP S/4 HANA environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, MIS, or related field (Masters preferred)
